data.author: Kiki

changelog.release_notes: V2 additional features -> Time displayed in different colors throughout the day for Pebble Time and Round. Color changes every 3 hours during the day from 6am-9pm.

Watchface for those who believe in beauty of simplicity :).
Displays time in digital format with a fallen flower as background.

data.description:
Simple watch face displays time in digital format with a fallen flower as background.
Updated version adds additional feature -> Time displayed in different colors throughout the day for Pebble Time and Round. Color changes every 3 hours during the day from 6am-9pm.
For example, 
Morning time from 6am-9am is displayed in Red
Morning work hours 9am-Noon displayed in Orange
Afternoon hours between noon-3pm displayed in Melon and so on...until cool night hours displayed in blue :)

If you like the watch face or have any ideas that can be incorporated, please email kikipebbleapps@gmail.com

Thank you!

latest_release.release_notes: V2 additional features -> Time displayed in different colors throughout the day for Pebble Time and Round. Color changes every 3 hours during the day from 6am-9pm.

data.title: Fallen Flower WatchFace
